channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-11525] Region server holding in region states is out of sync with meta
item.description: In RegionStates, we remove a region from the region list a region server hosts once the region is offline. However, in meta, we do this only when the region is assigned to a new region server. We should keep them in sync so that we can claim they are consistent.
item.summary: Region server holding in region states is out of sync with meta

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Does RegionStates have to know about this +import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.generated.ZooKeeperProtos? i.e. about zk? You want to know table disabled/enabled and you are asking ZK. Could you go via a Proxy/Interface? We want to remove this enabling/disabling from zk anyways? No biggie if not. Could do in separate issue.

Very nice tests Jimmy.

+1
